title: 4.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create an HTML page with two buttons named addAfter and addBefore. Display a text below it. Write the JavaScript code to implement the following:
● If the user clicks the addAfter button, another text should be added below the existing one.
● If the user clicks the addBefore button, another text should be added above the existing one.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
